parameters.name: Logic
parameters.description: Specifies whether the database is a logical database.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: PermType
parameters.description:
The type of the permission. Valid values:

*   DATABASE: permissions on databases
*   TABLE: permissions on tables
*   COLUMN: permissions on fields

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> : To view the ID of the tenant, log on to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~).
